title: Plan to enter mass market EV segment in India: Skoda Auto
description: Skoda Auto plans to enter India's mass market of electric vehicles segment, exploring options including partnerships with local companies for economies of scale. The company is testing its premium electric SUV Enyaq and aims to participate in the growth of the electric market in India.
